item.title: Flink Cluster
item.description: execution environment Creates an execution environment that represents the context in which the program is currently executed. If the program is invoked standalone, this method returns a local execution environment. If the program is invoked from within the command line client to be submitted to a cluster, this method returns the execution environment of this cluster. REST instead of akka in 1.5 changing the client to communicate via REST instead of akka.
